Event.Text:
While traversing a range of sand dunes, Miles pipes up and points out the window at a small sand dune, exclaiming that there's something underneath it and we should check it out.
Miles predictions have been helpful on past expeditions, so it might be worth checking out, but that sand dune would easily cost us a whole day to dig up.

Choice.Text: Grab some digging tools from our storage and get to work.
